headline: Imperial Oil to Cut 20% of Workforce in Next Two Years
summary: The job cuts, along with broader restructuring efforts, are expected to save $150 million a year by 2028, the Canadian oil company said.

headline: Babcock & Wilcox Receives Advanced Wet Gas Scrubbing Technology Award for Refinery in Canada
summary: AKRON, Ohio, September 29, 2025--B&W has received an initial $10 million order as part of an award valued at approximately $40 million to supply Wet Gas Scrubbing technology.

headline: Nigeria Clears TotalEnergies Exit from Bonga Field
summary: The NUPRC approved TotalEnergies' sale of its 12.5 percent stake in OML 118, which includes the producing Bonga field, to Shell and Eni for $510 million.

raw.headline: Nigeria Clears TotalEnergies Exit from Bonga Field

headline: Wall Street drifts as tech stocks climb and oil prices sink
summary: Wall Street is drifting in mixed trading on Monday as technology stocks recover some of their losses from late last week and oil prices sink.  The S&P 500 added 0.3% in midday trading.  While the moves were modest, they were still two of the strongest forces lifting the S&P 500 Monday because they’re two of Wall Street's most valuable stocks.
